thread.title: Sunmi Confirmed To Have Signed With MakeUs Entertainment
thread.title_full: Sunmi Confirmed To Have Signed With MakeUs Entertainment

author: uing
title: Sunmi Confirmed To Have Signed With MakeUs Entertainment
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Former Wonder Girls member Sunmi signed with MakeUs Entertainment around the end of February. 
Home to talented singers like Park Won and Urban Zakapa, MakeUs Entertainment is expected to help Sunmi bring out her full potential as a musician. 
A source from the agency expressed, “We will fully support her with the right musical environment to help her get settled as a musician.” They also posted the following image on their official social media to welcome their new artist. 
Meanwhile, Sunmi commented, “At my new agency, I will work hard on my music and show everyone a new side to myself. Ahead of that, I would like to thank my previous agency, fans, and acquaintances for their support.”
